00279 template<class T>
00280 class Observer : public IObserver<T>
00281 {
00282 private:
00283     typedef void(T::*NotifyMethod)(INotification*);
00284     typedef T* NotifyContext;
00285     NotifyMethod notifyMethod;
00286     NotifyContext notifyContext;
00287 public:
00298     Observer( NotifyMethod method, NotifyContext context )
00299     {
00300         this->setNotifyMethod(method);
00301         this->setNotifyContext(context);
00302     }
00311     void setNotifyMethod( NotifyMethod method )
00312     {
00313         this->notifyMethod = method;
00314     }
00320     void setNotifyContext( NotifyContext context )
00321     {
00322         this->notifyContext = context;
00323     }
00329     NotifyMethod getNotifyMethod()
00330     {
00331         return this->notifyMethod;
00332     }
00338     NotifyContext getNotifyContext()
00339     {
00340         return this->notifyContext;
00341     }
00347     void notifyObserver( INotification* notification )
00348     {
00349         (this->notifyContext->*notifyMethod)(notification);
00350     }
00357     bool compareNotifyContext( NotifyContext compareContext )
00358     {
00359         return &*compareContext == &*this->notifyContext;
00360     }
00361 };

00366 class Proxy : public IProxy<T>, public Notifier
00367 {
00368 public:
00394     Proxy()
00395     {
00396     }
00397     Proxy(std::string proxyName, T data)
00398     {
00399         this->data = data;
00400     }
00401     Proxy(std::string proxyName)
00402     {
00403     }
00404     Proxy(T data)
00405     {
00406         this->data = data;
00407     }
00411     std::string getProxyName()
00412     {
00413     }
00414 
00418     void setData( T data )
00419     {
00420         this->data = data;
00421     }
00422 
00426     T getData()
00427     {
00428         return this->data;
00429     }
00430 
00434     virtual void onRegister(){}
00435 
00439     virtual void onRemove(){}
00440 
00441     static std::string NAME;
00442 
00443 protected:
00444     // the proxy name
00445     std::string proxyName;
00446 
00447     // the data object
00448     T data;
00449 };
